content: from crochet today > you ll love stitching these speedy easy and inexpensive bibs a set in several colors makes a gorgeous gift put your imagination to work with this basic project sprinkle polka dots wherever you like weave ribbon through the stitches or crochet in stripes skill level easy yarn pattern requires 1 ball each of main color and contrast color for bib and 1 ball of each additional color for polka dots additional supplies one 3/4 /19 mm button button thread or plain dental floss sewing needle tapestry needle small safety pin other gauges one extra-large polka dot measures 1 75 /4 5 cm across using size g/4 4 mm crochet hook one large polka dot measures 1 5 /4 cm across using size g/4 4 mm crochet hook one medium polka dot measures 1 25 /3 cm across using size g/4 4 mm crochet hook one small polka dot measures 1 /2 5 cm across using size g/4 4 mm crochet hook
